full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHEN PO RDO RJE LEGS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PO'I LAS LA BSKUL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA BDUD 'JOMS DBANG PO GANGS BSANGS RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DAM CAN CHEN PO RDO RJE LEGS PA LA 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PO'I LAS LA BSKUL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA BDUD 'JOMS DPA' PO'I GANGS BSANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS AOR DU SU MER GEN AA HAS TSE DBANG RDO RJE SOGS BSRUNG MA 'DI NYID BSTEN MCHOD TSUL BZHIN BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA DANG, NYI CHAD DOGS PA BZHAN 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MTHONG NAS RIGS 'DZIN BDUN DHARMA BADZRA GYIS PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
